title: Delhi's power demand crosses 6,800 MW as mercury rises: Discoms
description: Delhi recorded a peak power demand of 6,834 MW, with TPDDL meeting 2,035 MW in north Delhi. The discoms prepared for the estimated 8,000 MW peak demand with agreements and contingency plans.
